name: Abyssal Dungeon
description:
A game made for a weekly game jam with the theme of "Explore the Abyss", in which you fight floating eyeballs in a randomly generated level. Once you have defeated all the enemies on the floor, you will be sent to the next one until you die. Magic energy is regenerated by attacking enemies with your sword.

Controls 

  • WASD = Move
  • Space = Dash
  • Mouse = Aim
  • Left Click = Sword
  • Right Click = Magic Spell
